**TragicServers** was founded in May 2012 to provide quality game, voice and virtual private servers. We only use OWNED enterprise grade hardware/servers powered by Intel processors, RAID-10 arrays for drive safety and much more. VPS are located in Chicago, IL, Dallas, TX and Los Angeles, CA. Our goal is to provide the best experience for our customers and best service, period. 

If this is your first time hearing about us, we recently did an interview with LEB, https://lowendbox.com/blog/interview-roilan-owner-of-tragicservers-com/. We've also had some kind words posted by a Moderator at LET https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/88700/tragicservers-a-good-example-of-how-to-stand-out-from-other-providers 

We’ve also started a community and anyone is welcome to join [here](http://slack.tragicservers.com/)! Feel free to join and chat. I’d love to get to know you and talk :)

**VPS Features:**

* SolusVM Control Panel
* OpenVZ / KVM Virtualization
* Additional IPv4 addresses available
* Additional IPv6 addresses available
* Automated rDNS
* Instant Setup

**What’s new:**
All our OVZ plans include FREE backups. This is built in-house and is integrated directly in WHMCS. Once your VPS is approved, you’ll see this option and able to store / download your backup on demand!

We are working on backups and custom ISO uploading for our KVM customers next!
